MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy analysis statistics calculated from the HERCULES acquisition.
MeasurementToolMetadata.Name: Osprey HERCULES sum AlphaCorrWaterScaled

img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.name: img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterScaled_Voxel_1_Basis_1_candidate_age
img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.Description: Age (in years) of the candidate at the time of the first acquired scan
img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.table_label: MRS - HERCULES sum - Alpha-Corrected Water-Scaled Concentrations

img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.name: img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterScaled_Voxel_1_Basis_1_adjusted_age
img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.Description: Adjusted Chronological Age Based On the EDD (Weeks)
img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.table_label: MRS - HERCULES sum - Alpha-Corrected Water-Scaled Concentrations

img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.name: img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterScaled_Voxel_1_Basis_1_GABA
img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.Description: GABA alpha-corrected molal concentration, using tissue corrected water
img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.note: GABA scaled to tissue corrected water according to Gasparovic et al, Magn Reson Med 55:1219-26 (2006). Alpha (cWM/cGM) correction applied according to: ConcIU/(fGM + alpha*fWM), with group normalization: (meanfGM + alpha * meanfWM) / ((fGM + alpha * fWM) * (meanfGM + meanfWM))
img_osprey_HERCULES_sum_AlphaCorrWaterSc.table_label: MRS - HERCULES sum - Alpha-Corrected Water-Scaled Concentrations

Alpha (cWM/cGM) correction applied according to: ConcIU/(fGM + alpha*fWM), with group normalization: (meanfGM + alpha * meanfWM) / ((fGM + alpha * fWM) * (meanfGM + meanfWM))
